title: WaveSpeed AI - Create Captivating Reflections Instantly

hero.heading: Create Stunning Reflections in Photos
hero.description: Enhance your images by generating mesmerizing reflections effortlessly.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Add a reflection of the sunset on water...

examples.heading: Before & After Reflection Examples
examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed AI can elevate your photos with stunning reflections.

items.imageAlt: Example showing artistic reflections in photos

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our innovative technology delivers remarkable results with unparalleled simplicity.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Generate reflections in seconds with our cutting-edge algorithms. No delays in processing.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No complex skills needed. Just upload your photo and our AI handles the rest.

items.title: Privacy Assured
items.description: All processing is done securely in your browser, ensuring your images are never uploaded or stored.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to stunning reflections

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or browse to select it. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our smart AI analyzes your image and generates beautiful reflections tailored to your scene.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: Preview your enhanced image and download it in high quality to share or use.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied customers who enrich their visuals with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Clark
items.comment: The reflection feature took my sunset photos to the next level! I can’t believe how easy it was.

items.name: James Li
items.comment: As a content creator, this tool saves me so much time. Stunning reflections in seconds!

items.name: Lisa Brown
items.comment: I love how my images now have depth. The reflections look incredibly realistic!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the Reflection Generator

items.title: What types of reflections can I generate?
items.description: You can create a variety of reflections such as water, glass, or mirror effects, perfectly tailored to your image context.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed AI free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free daily credits, enabling endless creativity. Earn more credits through activities in our community.

items.title: Can I use the generated reflections for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, if you subscribe to a paid plan, you can utilize generated content for commercial purposes. Free users may only use it for personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy ensured during processing?
items.description: Your images are processed directly in your browser. No uploads, no storage—ensuring complete privacy. Once you close the tab, all data is cleared.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the transformation. No registration needed.
